idea-plugin.name: Cucumber for Scala
idea-plugin.description: Enables Reference tracking of glue code when using cucumber-scala DSL. Requires Scala language integration from Community Repo and the JetBrains cucumber plugin. Issue tracking at GitHub.
idea-plugin.change-notes:

    2. Upgrade to Scala 2.13.3
    3. Upgrade to Cucumber 6.8.0
  • 2020.2.2: Release for IntelliJ 2020.2.2.

    2. Upgrade to Scala 2.12.12
    3. Upgrade to Cucumber 6.7.0
